de.samdev.absgdx.framework.menu.elements

Class MenuBaseElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.samdev.absgdx.framework.menu.elements.MenuBaseElement
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MenuButton, MenuCheckBox, MenuContainer, MenuEdit, MenuImage, MenuLabel, MenuSettingsTree

    public abstract class MenuBaseElement
extends java.lang.Object
    A single element in a Menu Layer (e.g. Buttons, Panels, Checkboxes ...)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String identifier
      the unique identifier to identify this element
      protected java.util.List<MenuBaseElementListener> listeners

      the owner-layer *(can be null when not added to layer)*
      protected MenuBaseElement parent
      the owner *(can be null when not added to an owner)*
      protected GUITextureProvider textureprovider

      • renderElement

        public final void renderElement(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch sbatch,
                 com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.ShapeRenderer srenderer,
                 com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.BitmapFont defaultfont,
                 MenuOwner owner)
        Renders the element (always call this function instead of directly calling render ) Performs preparation needed before rendering
        Parameters:
        sbatch - the BatchRenderer (from LibGDX)
        srenderer - the ShapeRenderer (from LibGDX)
        defaultfont - the default font to use
        owner - the Menu in which this element exists

      • getCoordinateOffsetX

        public int getCoordinateOffsetX()
        When (eg) rendering the coordinate matrix is translated by a specific amount This method returns this amount

        Returns:
